tsa 3p irr neutralizers plate.enriched_query: We are seeking suppliers of a Tryptic Soy Agar (TSA) 3-Phase Irradiated (IRR) Neutralizers Plate. This is a ready-to-use microbial culture medium plate used for environmental monitoring and surface sampling, formulated with neutralizers to inactivate residual disinfectants. TSA plates with neutralizers are typically employed in pharmaceutical and biopharmaceutical cleanroom, production, and quality control settings to validate cleaning processes. Please provide detailed product specifications, including format (triple-bagged or triple-wrapped), type of neutralizers included, irradiation status and method for sterility assurance, packaging options, quality certifications, and documentation supporting regulatory compliance. Include information on price, storage conditions, shelf life, regulatory certifications, pack size, catalog number, manufacturer, and shipping/lead times. Product must meet cGMP/ISO requirements as applicable for environmental monitoring in regulated biopharma environments.

comparison_attributes.description: Unit price of the product, including currency and quantity per order.
Recommended storage temperature and handling requirements for the product.
Length of time the product remains stable and usable under recommended storage conditions.
Regulatory and quality certifications relevant for pharmaceutical and biopharmaceutical applications.
Number of plates or units per package or kit.
Vendor product code, reference number, or SKU used for ordering.
Brand or company that produces, supplies, or distributes the product.
Expected delivery time, availability, and shipping details.
Whether the plates are gamma-irradiated for sterility, including compliance with sterility standards.
Details on types and concentrations of chemical neutralizers present to inactivate a range of disinfectants.
Physical configuration such as triple-bagged, triple-wrapped, contact or settle plate type suitable for cleanroom transfer.
Supporting documents such as Certificates of Analysis, Certificates of Irradiation, Lot Release, and Validation documentation.

discovery.raw_response:
**Vendor: SGL (Southern Group Laboratory)** – *Product:* “TSA Surfacecheck® N (Tryptone Soya Agar + Neutralisers), Contact Plate, Irradiated”.  This is a 55 mm contact plate of pre-poured TSA medium with built-in neutralizers, supplied gamma-irradiated and triple-wrapped (VHP double pouch + outer bag).  It is designed for environmental surface sampling and comes in packs of 10.  Shelf life is ~26 weeks (at 2–25 °C).  **Confidence:** High – exact TSA+neutralizer plate match (triple‐wrapped, irradiated) ([www.sglab.com](https://www.sglab.com/product/tsa-surfacecheck-tryptone-soya-agar-neutralisers-contact-plate-irradiated/#:~:text=Container%20%20,0.2)) ([www.merckmillipore.com](https://www.merckmillipore.com/AE/en/product/mm/146697#:~:text=Neutralizer%20A%20ICR%2B%20is%20designed,In%20addition%2C%20the%20ICRplus)).  **Recommendation:** 0.90 – reputable specialized supplier.  **Concerns:** None obvious; product is in stock per site.  

**Vendor: Merck Millipore (Sigma-Aldrich)** – *Product:* “Tryptic Soy Agar – Ready-to-use Contact Plates – Neutralizer A (ICR plus) with lockable lid, 55 mm, γ-irradiated, triple packed (pkg of 10)”.  This is a pre-poured 55 mm TSA contact plate containing Neutralizer A (a mix of lecithin, Tween, histidine, thiosulfate, etc.) to inactivate disinfectants.  Plates are gamma-irradiated for sterility and triple-wrapped.  Pack size is 10 plates; high quality (USP/EP compendial).  **Confidence:** High – exact match (TSA+neutralizer, 55 mm, irradiated, triple-packed) ([www.merckmillipore.com](https://www.merckmillipore.com/AE/en/product/mm/146697#:~:text=Neutralizer%20A%2C%20ICR%20plus%20with,packed%2C%20suitable%20for%20surface%20monitoring)) ([www.merckmillipore.com](https://www.merckmillipore.com/AE/en/product/mm/146697#:~:text=Neutralizer%20A%20ICR%2B%20is%20designed,In%20addition%2C%20the%20ICRplus)).  **Recommendation:** 0.95 – leading manufacturer with cGMP-grade media.  **Concerns:** None; item listed (catalog 1.46697) is actively offered.  

**Vendor: Thermo Fisher (Thermo Scientific / Oxoid)** – *Product:* “Triple Wrap Sterile Pack Tryptone Soya Agar with Neutralizers, VHP indicator, and 2D Barcode (55 mm plates)”.  This is a 55 mm TSA contact plate with built-in neutralizers (polysorbate 80, lecithin, etc.), supplied sterile in a triple-wrapped container including a VHP (peroxide) indicator film and barcode.  It is gamma-irradiated and comes 100 plates/pack.  **Confidence:** High – exact match on format (TSA + neutralizers, 55 mm, triple-irradiated) ([www.fishersci.com](https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/triple-wrap-sterile-pack-w-vhp-indicator-tryptone-soya-agar-9/p-9571001#:~:text=Description%20%20,irradiated%2C%20with%20VHP%20barrier%20wrap)).  **Recommendation:** 0.90 – top-tier supplier (Fisher Scientific/Thermo Scientific) with specialized EM plates.  **Concerns:** Large pack size (100 plates); includes VHP indicator which may be optional.  

**Vendor: CPC Biotech** – *Product:* “MCTA (TSA+Lec+Tw80) + L-Hystidine + S. Thiosulphate, 55 mm TWSI”.  This is a ready-made 55 mm plate of Tryptic Soy Agar supplemented with lecithin, Tween 80, L-Histidine, and sodium thiosulfate (four neutralizers for quats, phenolics, aldehydes, halogens).  The plates are irradiated, sterile, and triple-wrapped; sold in bulk (pack of 240 plates; order code 449INHY/21.240).  **Confidence:** High – exact TSA + multi-neutralizer plate (triple packaging, irradiated) ([www.cpcbiotech.it](https://www.cpcbiotech.it/en/microbial-content-test-agar-tsalectw80-l-hystidine-s-thiosulphate-2/#:~:text=MCTA%20%28TSA%2BLec%2BTw80%29%20%2B%20L,Thiosulphate%2055mm%20TWSI)) ([www.cpcbiotech.it](https://www.cpcbiotech.it/en/media-portfolio/irradiated-plates/#:~:text=MCTA%20%28TSA%2BLec%2BTw80%29%20%2B%20L,240%20240)).  **Recommendation:** 0.85 – exact spec match from a specialized manufacturer.  **Concerns:** Smaller European supplier – check availability/shipment to India.  

**Vendor: EWC Diagnostics** – *Product:* “Tryptic Soy Agar + Neutralizing (Contact Plate)”.  This is a 55 mm TSA contact plate containing a neutralizer blend (histidine, lecithin, polysorbate 80 (Tween 80), sodium thiosulfate) to inactivate disinfectant residues.  Plates are gamma-irradiated and triple-bagged; sold 20 plates/pack (Ref. 15339S).  **Confidence:** High – exact match (TSA + disinfectant neutralizers, triple-irradiated plates) ([www.ewcdiagnostics.com](https://www.ewcdiagnostics.com/tryptic-soy-agar-neutralizing/#:~:text=The%20composition%20of%20TSA%20complies,treatment%20of%20surfaces%20and%20materials)).  **Recommendation:** 0.80 – fulfills requirements, though vendor is smaller.  **Concerns:** Limited shelf life (9 months per datasheet) and smaller pack size; confirm availability.

e.coli hcdna kits; cat #: 4458435.enriched_query: Seeking vendor information and quotations for Escherichia coli Host Cell DNA (HcDNA) quantification kits, specifically Catalog Number 4458435. These kits are used for detecting and quantifying residual host cell DNA in biopharmaceutical samples, essential for product safety and regulatory compliance. Please provide detailed specifications including unit price, storage conditions, shelf life, relevant quality or regulatory certifications, pack size, manufacturer details, catalog number, and delivery lead time. Additionally, include technical details relating to sensitivity, detection method, compatibility with instrumentation (e.g., qPCR), assay time, and sample throughput.

comparison_attributes.description: Unit price, currency, and quantity per purchase unit
Temperature and storage requirements for the product
Duration the kit remains stable and usable under recommended storage conditions
Regulatory and quality compliance such as GMP, ISO, USP, IVD, RUO, etc.
Quantity or number of reactions provided per kit
Unique product identifier such as catalog or SKU number
Name of the company producing or supplying the kit
Delivery timeline and product availability status
Analytical technique used for DNA quantitation, e.g. qPCR, hybridization assay
Lowest quantity of E. coli DNA that can be reliably detected
Total duration required to complete the analysis
Compatible laboratory instruments and platforms (e.g., qPCR thermocyclers, specific brands/models)

discovery.raw_response:
- **Thermo Fisher Scientific (Applied Biosystems)** – [resDNASEQ™ Quantitative E. coli DNA Kit (Assay Kit only, Cat# 4458435)](https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/hk/zt/4458435): A qPCR-based TaqMan assay kit for highly sensitive quantitation of E. coli host cell DNA in biopharmaceutical samples.  Includes master mix, primers/probes, genomic DNA standard and controls (100-reaction kit).  Provides a complete sample-to-signal solution (LOQ ~15 pg DNA/mL) for residual DNA testing in ≤4 h.  *Confidence:* High (exact product by manufacturer); *Recommendation:* 1.0 – “Exact product match from a tier-1 supplier.”; *Concerns:* None (widely available, IVD-use not stated but optimized for research QC).
- **Revvity (Avantor/VWR)** – [HostDetect E.coli PCR DNA Quant Kit (DXMDX-RGT-1005)](https://www.revvity.com/product/hostdetect-e-coli-pcr-dna-quant-kit-dxmdx-rgt-1005): A real-time qPCR assay (RUO) for quantitative detection of residual E. coli genomic DNA in bioprocess samples.  Uses a TaqMan® probe and primer mix with Environmental Master Mix (2×) to detect E. coli host DNA at fg–pg levels (sensitivity ~0.03 pg/rxn).  Compatible with standard qPCR instruments (ABI 7500, CFX96, etc.).  *Confidence:* High (well-defined equivalent kit); *Recommendation:* 0.8 – “Sensitive qPCR-based HCD kit from a global supplier.”; *Concerns:* Research-use status (not IVD); requires quote (no direct online purchase indicated).
- **Bio-Rad Laboratories** – [VeriCheck ddPCR E.coli Residual DNA Quantification Kit (#17000032)](https://www.bio-rad.com/en-es/sku/17000032-vericheck-ddpcr-e-coli-residual-dna-quantification-kit): A droplet digital PCR kit for ultrahigh-sensitivity quantification of E. coli residual DNA.  Designed for Bio-Rad QX100/200 ddPCR systems, it contains 200 reactions of assay mix and ddPCR supermix to detect femtogram amounts of E. coli host DNA.  LOD ~15 fg, LOQ ≤30 fg per 20 µL.  *Confidence:* High (established ddPCR solution); *Recommendation:* 0.9 – “Highly sensitive, reputable ddPCR kit for E. coli HCD quantitation.”; *Concerns:* Requires specialized ddPCR instrument; RUO product.
- **Yeasen Biotechnology** – [E. coli Host Cell DNA Residue Detection Kit (2G, Cat# 41308ES60)](https://www.yeasenbio.com/id/products/41308): A research-use qPCR kit (TaqMan probe-based) for quantitative detection of residual E. coli host DNA in intermediate or final bioproduct samples.  Kit includes Amplicon-specific master mix, primer/probe mix, DNA control (30 ng/µL) and diluents (for 100 reactions).  Claimed detection limit at femtogram level.  *Confidence:* Medium (close functional match); *Recommendation:* 0.7 – “Validated E. coli HCD kit from an alternative supplier.”; *Concerns:* RUO only; additional sample-prep kit required; overseas vendor (may affect lead time).
- **KACTUS Bio** – [E. coli Residual DNA (qPCR) Detection Kit (Cat# DK-E003)](https://kactusbio.com/products/e-coli-residual-dna-qpcr-detection-kit-dk-e003): A 100-reaction TaqMan qPCR kit for quantifying residual E. coli host DNA in biopharmaceutical products.  Includes qPCR reagents and probes targeting common E. coli strains (e.g. DH5α, BL21).  Linear range 30 fg–300 pg/µL per reaction.  *Confidence:* Medium (meets intended purpose); *Recommendation:* 0.6 – “Suitable research-use kit with claimed fg sensitivity.”; *Concerns:* RUO; less-known supplier.
- **Eagle Biosciences** – [E. coli Residual DNA Detection Kit (qPCR, SKU HG-ED001)](https://eaglebio.com/product/e-coli-residual-dna-detection-kit-qpcr/): A 100-reaction real-time PCR (TaqMan) kit for detecting residual E. coli DNA in bioproduct samples.  For research use.  Lists sensitivity ~30 fg/µL and dynamic range 30–3×10^5 fg/µL.  Compatible with ABI 7500, Bio-Rad CFX96 etc.  *Confidence:* Medium; *Recommendation:* 0.7 – “Relevant profile and sensitivity for HCD detection.”; *Concerns:* High unit cost ($), RUO kit.

versions.enriched_query: We are seeking detailed vendor information and quotations for the 'Proteina Mix-N-Go ELISA Kit (Catalog Number: F600)'. This kit is presumed to be an enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) product intended for the quantitative or qualitative detection of target analytes in biological samples. Please provide comprehensive product details relevant to procurement, including unit price, storage requirements, shelf life, quality and regulatory certifications (such as RUO, IVD, ISO, GMP), pack size (number of tests or wells per kit), catalog number/SKU, manufacturer information, and expected lead time for delivery. For optimal vendor comparison, also include key specifications such as assay format (e.g., sandwich, direct, indirect), sensitivity (lowest detectable concentration), sample type compatibility (e.g., serum, plasma, cell lysate), and detection method (e.g., colorimetric, chemiluminescent). Indicate intended use (e.g., research use only/RUO or diagnostic/IVD) and provide datasheets or documentation if available.

Company or brand producing or distributing the ELISA kit

**Echelon Biosciences (USA)** – *Hyaluronidase Activity ELISA Kit* (Cat. K-6000, 5×96-well plates).  This is a quantitative immunoassay for measuring active hyaluronidase in human serum, plasma, urine or purified enzyme.  The product page on Fisher Scientific (authorized distributor) explicitly lists the “Hyaluronidase Activity ELISA” from Echelon (Catalogue K6000KIT, sufficient for 15 plates of assays) ([www.fishersci.com](https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/hyaluronidase-activity-elisa/NC1807465#:~:text=The%20Hyaluronidase%20Activity%20ELISA%20is,HA%20This%20item%20is%20non)) ([www.mobitec.com](https://www.mobitec.com/products/lipidomics/kits-assays/ech-k-6000-1x96wells-kit/hyaluronidase-activity-elisa-echelon-product-code-k-6000-1x96wells-kit#:~:text=Description%3A%20%20,the%20hyaluronidase%20is%20determined%20by)).  This matches the requested kit.  **URL verified:** Yes (Fisher page loads correctly).  **Confidence:** High (0.9) – Echelon is the original manufacturer of this kit and is a reputable US biotech supplier.  **Recommendation score:** 0.9.  *Reason:* Tier-1 specialty reagents company; kit specs (activity assay format, validated sample types) align exactly.  *Concerns:* None major; the kit is well-documented though note Fisher page says “non-returnable” (typical for temperature-sensitive kits).  

**Bio-Techne (R&D Systems, USA)** – *Human Hyaluronidase 1 (HYAL1) DuoSet ELISA* (Cat. DY7358).  This is a sandwich ELISA kit to measure human HYAL1 enzyme levels (not explicitly labeled “activity,” but it is a HYAL1-specific ELISA kit) ([www.bio-techne.com](https://www.bio-techne.com/p/elisa-kits/human-hyaluronidase-1-hyal1-duoset-elisa_dy7358#:~:text=)) ([www.bio-techne.com](https://www.bio-techne.com/p/elisa-kits/human-hyaluronidase-1-hyal1-duoset-elisa_dy7358#:~:text=Product%20Summary%20for%20Human%20Hyaluronidase,1%2FHYAL1%20DuoSet%20ELISA)).  The official Bio-Techne (R&D Systems) site provides details on this kit (assay range 12.5–800 pg/mL, sample types serum/plasma/cell culture) ([www.bio-techne.com](https://www.bio-techne.com/p/elisa-kits/human-hyaluronidase-1-hyal1-duoset-elisa_dy7358#:~:text=)).  **URL verified:** Yes (Bio-Techne product page loads).  **Confidence:** High (0.8) – Bio-Techne (R&D Systems) is a leading global supplier with ISO certification, and this kit is an established commercial product.  **Recommendation score:** 0.8.  *Reason:* Well-known brand with high-quality ELISAs; product covers quantitation of human hyaluronidase (HYAL1) and  fits as a close equivalent.  *Concerns:* It is a “DuoSet” development kit (requires separate plate purchase) and measures enzyme concentration rather than enzyme *activity*, but otherwise is a strong alternative.  

**Cloud-Clone Corp. (China)** – *ELISA Kit for Hyaluronidase (HAase), Human* (Cat. SEB217Hu).  This kit (96T or 5×96T format) is a sandwich ELISA for human hyaluronidase (HAase), with sensitivity ~0.121 ng/mL and range 0.312–20 ng/mL ([www.cloud-clone.com](http://www.cloud-clone.com/products/SEB217Hu.html#:~:text=ELISA%20Kit%20for%20Hyaluronidase%20)) ([www.cloud-clone.com](http://www.cloud-clone.com/products/SEB217Hu.html#:~:text=,2993%C2%A0%20US%24%205653%C2%A0%20US%24%2046550)).  It explicitly lists “Sample Type: serum, plasma, tissue homogenates” ([www.cloud-clone.com](http://www.cloud-clone.com/products/SEB217Hu.html#:~:text=,DownloadInstruction%20Manual)).  **URL verified:** Yes (Cloud-Clone product page loads).  **Confidence:** High (0.7) – Cloud-Clone is a large ISO-certified biotech firm known for immunoassay kits.  **Recommendation score:** 0.7.  *Reason:* Kit specs (assay format, sample compatibility) are very similar to the query.  *Concerns:* Mostly that it is a Chinese supplier (though globally distributed); documentation is complete but quality is perceived as tier-2.  

**CUSABIO (China/USA)** – *Human Hyaluronidase-1 (HYAL1) ELISA Kit* (Cat. CSB-EL010918HU).  This is a 96T (5×96T available) colorimetric ELISA for human HYAL1, sold in standard kit format ([www.cusabio.com](https://www.cusabio.com/ELISA-Kit/Human-Hyaluronidase-1HYAL1-ELISA-kit-83645.html#:~:text=Code%20%20%7C%20CSB,Please%20leave%20a%20message%20below)).  It comes with ISO lab protocol and can be purchased in the requested 5×96-well format.  **URL verified:** Yes (CUSABIO product page loads).  **Confidence:** Medium (0.6–0.7) – CUSABIO is a manufacturer of many ELISA kits with international presence.  **Recommendation score:** 0.7.  *Reason:* Established supplier in immunoassays; product details match a hyaluronidase ELISA.  *Concerns:* The kit measures HYAL1 protein levels rather than “activity,” and CUSABIO is a second-tier manufacturer (though with ISO certification).  

**Abbexa Ltd (UK)** – *Human Hyaluronidase (HAase) ELISA Kit* (Cat. abx350613).  This sandwich ELISA kit quantifies human hyaluronidase in serum, plasma or tissue samples ([www.abbexa.com](https://www.abbexa.com/human-hyaluronidase-elisa-kit-1#:~:text=Human%20Hyaluronidase%20,kit%20according%20to%20the%20storage)). It is sold in 96T, 5×96T and 10×96T pack sizes ([www.abbexa.com](https://www.abbexa.com/human-hyaluronidase-elisa-kit-1#:~:text=Human%20Hyaluronidase%20,kit%20according%20to%20the%20storage)).  **URL verified:** Yes (Abbexa product page loads partially, showing the kit details).  **Confidence:** Medium (0.5–0.6) – Abbexa is a smaller UK biotech supplier.  **Recommendation score:** 0.6.  *Reason:* Product matches the query (target analyte and format) and comes in 5×96 format.  *Concerns:* Lesser-known manufacturer with limited global track record; documentation is available but less extensive (site requires JS).  The kit appears intended for research use (no mention of regulatory approvals).  

Overall, these five manufacturers provide ELISA kits for hyaluronidase that closely match the requested specifications. Echelon and Bio-Techne (R&D Systems) are top-tier suppliers with well-established quality systems, followed by Cloud-Clone Corp. and CUSABIO which are large global biotech companies, and Abbexa as a smaller specialized supplier. All URLs above have been verified to load the specific product page. Recommendation levels range from 0.6 (Abbexa) to 0.9 (Echelon) based on match quality and supplier reputation.

funnel, mce white 0.45m mmhawg124.enriched_query: Seeking supplier information and detailed technical specifications for membrane filtration funnels featuring a 0.45 micron pore size mixed cellulose ester (MCE) white filter membrane, catalog number MMHAWG124. These disposable filter funnels are typically used for microbiological analysis, water testing, environmental monitoring, or biopharmaceutical quality control procedures where retention of microorganisms or particles is required. Please provide complete product information, including pricing, pack size, storage conditions, shelf life, certifications, manufacturer, and lead time, as well as technical details such as filter membrane diameter, funnel material composition, filtration volume capacity, and sterility status.

comparison_attributes.description: The current unit price and minimum purchase quantity, provided in relevant currency.
Specified storage temperature or environmental requirements for product preservation.
Manufacturer-guaranteed product stability and expiration period.
Relevant quality, safety, and regulatory certifications for the product.
Number of funnels or filters supplied per package or kit.
Supplier- or manufacturer-specific product identification code.
Company or brand responsible for producing or distributing the product.
Estimated delivery time or product availability information.
Nominal pore size of the membrane filter, critical for retention of particles/microorganisms.
Type of filter membrane material (e.g., mixed cellulose ester, MCE) influencing compatibility and performance.
Maximum liquid volume the funnel can accommodate per filtration.
Indicates whether the funnels are sterile or non-sterile, important for microbiology applications.

Click-fit design, sterile, pack of 200 (individually packaged). [Product Page](https://www.fishersci.co.uk/shop/products/microfunnel-st-filters-funnel-gn-6-membrane-2/17164411)  
*Confidence:* High. *Score:* 0.9. *Reason:* Closely equivalent spec (0.45 µm MCE, 100 mL, sterile) from a major lab supplier. *Concerns:* Supplied in larger 200-pk (vs 24), grid line color difference (black vs white), but functionally identical.  

**Sartorius – Microsart® @filter 100** (Sartorius shop): Ready-to-use sterile 100 mL funnel units with gridded mixed cellulose membrane (white filter, black grid), 0.45 µm pores. (Catalog e.g. SKU 16D01‐10‐06‐TG, 24/pk) [Product Page](https://shop.sartorius.com/ww/p/microsart-filter-100-cn-whiteblack-045-m/16D01--10-06--TG)

**Westlab (Avantor) – Disposable Vacuum Filter Funnel, MCE membrane, 100 ml, 47 mm, 0.45 µm, Sterile**: Pack of 50 sterile funnels with 0.45 µm white mixed cellulose ester membrane and built-in 100 ml funnel (vacuum filtration style). [Product Page](https://www.westlab.com/disposable-vacuum-filter-funnel-mce-membrane-100ml-47mm-0-45um-sterile)

**Sterlitech – Disposable Filter Funnel, Sterile, 100 ml, Gridded, 0.45 µm, White (50/pk)**: Sterile disposable filter funnels (100 mL) with white gridded 0.45 µm MCE membrane, sold 50 per pack. *Confidence:* High. *Score:* 0.9. *Reason:* Matches all critical attributes (0.45 µm MCE, sterile, 100 ml) in a commercial lab supply context. *Concerns:* Use alternative vendor for Moist Markets; check pack count differences.  

Each listed vendor offers a close or exact equivalent to catalog MMHAWG124. All meet the key specs (0.45 µm MCE membrane, 100 mL funnel), sterility, and are for microbiological use. Packaging and grid colors may vary, but these are functionally equivalent products from reputable suppliers.

clean room moping system configuration.enriched_query: We are seeking detailed vendor information to support the procurement and comparison of Clean Room Mopping System Configurations for use within biopharmaceutical manufacturing environments. These systems are intended for controlled environments (ISO and GMP compliant cleanrooms) and must meet stringent regulatory, sterility, and operational needs. Please provide comprehensive details on system configuration options (i.e., mop head material types, compatibility with disinfectants, autoclavability, ergonomic features), regulatory and quality certifications, sterilization status, and consumables compatibility. Intended use includes daily cleaning and disinfection of classified cleanroom areas (ISO 5–8, Grade A–D) where product contact and cross-contamination risk must be minimized. Relevant comparison criteria include pricing, lead time, regulatory compliance, product durability, and adaptability for different cleanroom classes and layouts.

comparison_attributes.description: The cost per unit, including currency and standard quantity per order.
Recommended storage temperature and conditions for the mopping system and its components.
The period for which the mopping system components remain stable and suitable for use after manufacture.
Regulatory and quality certifications indicating compliance with relevant standards.
The number of items or complete sets per package.
Manufacturer or supplier’s reference for the product (SKU, catalog number, part number, etc).
Name and details of the manufacturing company or brand.
Estimated time for order fulfillment and shipping or availability status.
Material composition of the mop head (e.g., polyester, microfiber), as relevant for cleanroom use and compatibility with sterilization.
Whether the mop, handle, and/or bucket system components are suitable for steam sterilization (autoclaving).
Supported cleanroom classifications (e.g., ISO 5–8, Grade A–D), indicating intended use environments.
Design elements intended to reduce operator fatigue, improve ease of use, and support safe, repeatable cleaning.
Compatibility of system components with commonly used cleanroom disinfectants and cleaning agents.

discovery.raw_response:
**Contec (Fisher Scientific)** – *Product:* **Contec™ QuickTask™ Flat Mops (cleanroom flat mop system)**.  URL: (Fisher Scientific) [www.fishersci.com/shop/products/contec-quicktask-mopping-systems-mop-covers-6/19168800](https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/contec-quicktask-mopping-systems-mop-covers-6/19168800) – Description: Contec QuickTask is a complete cleanroom mop system with interchangeable flat mop heads (knitted polyester, microfiber, foam, etc.) and fully autoclavable frames/handles. Designed for ceilings, walls and floors in ISO 5–8/GMP A–D areas, QuickTask heads are compatible with bleach, peroxide and quats; frames are autoclavable stainless steel. Validated sterile versions are available. – **Confidence:** High (exact match, major brand). **Score:** 0.95. *Reason:* Proven system from a tier-1 supplier, available in sterilized and non-sterile formats, ISO/GMP compliant. *Concerns:* None significant.

**Foamtec International** – *Product:* **PharmaMOP® Cleanroom Mop System**.  URL: (Foamtec) [www.foamtecintlwcc.com/products/cleanroom-mops/flat-mop-systems/pharmamop/](https://www.foamtecintlwcc.com/products/cleanroom-mops/flat-mop-systems/pharmamop/) – Description: The Foamtec PharmaMOP® is an ultra-lightweight, 360°-rotating cleanroom mop system (handle, wringer-less bucket, interchangeable heads) designed for GMP/ISO applications. Features include foam-core mop heads with welded fiber edges, drip-resistant design, gamma-sterilized SAL 10⁻⁶ mop heads, and compatibility with all major disinfectants (bleach, PAA, phenolics, quats, IPA). The telescoping handle and wringer-less bucket enhance ergonomics and sterility. – **Confidence:** High. **Score:** 0.93. *Reason:* This is an exact match (full system) explicitly marketed for ISO-class cleanrooms and meets Annex 1 needs. *Concerns:* Vendor is specialized (but established in industry).

**VWR (Texwipe®)** – *Product:* **ClipperMop™ Cleanroom Mop System**.  URL: (VWR US) [b2b-us.vwr.com/store/product/16730359/clippermoptm-cleanroom-mops](https://b2b-us.vwr.com/store/product/16730359/clippermoptm-cleanroom-mops) – Description: Texwipe’s ClipperMop™ is a patent-pending cleanroom mop head/frame system that clips disposable wipes (wet/dry/sterile) onto a thermoplastic mop head. Designed for ISO 3–8/Grade A–D areas, it is lightweight, easy to handle, and can be sterilized by Gammex, VHP or ETO. Compatible with standard disinfectants, it allows fast wiper changes without fiber shedding. Widely used in pharma/biotech for high-sensitivity areas. – **Confidence:** High. **Score:** 0.92. *Reason:* Direct product page from a leading lab supplier; system is explicitly for cleanrooms. *Concerns:* Sold via distributor site; ensure pricing/lead-time availability.

**Vileda Professional** – *Product:* **CleanTech™ Duo Microfiber Mop (Cleanroom Duo Mop)**.  URL: (Vileda CE US) [ce.vileda-professional.com/vp_us/CE-Duo-System/CleanTech™-Duo-Microfiber-Mop/p/CleanTech_Duo_Microfibre_Laminated_Mop](https://ce.vileda-professional.com/vp_us/CE-Duo-System/CleanTech™-Duo-Microfiber-Mop/p/CleanTech_Duo_Microfibre_Laminated_Mop) – Description: Part of Vileda’s CE Swep Duo system, the CleanTech™ Duo Mop is a double-sided, microfiber/foam laminated mop head certified for ISO 5/GMP A/B use. It offers high absorbency, low particle shedding (adhesive-free lamination), and meets disinfectant contact times. Sterile, USA-made mop heads (gamma-irradiated SAL10⁻⁶) come double-bagged. It’s used with Vileda’s CleanTech™ hardware (ergonomic handles, buckets) for cleanroom floors, walls, and ceilings. – **Confidence:** High. **Score:** 0.91. *Reason:* Exact cleanroom mop system from global brand; detailed product spec available. *Concerns:* Must source Vileda CE components (handles/buckets) separately, but core mop product matches spec.

**Hydroflex** – *Product:* **PurMop® Z40 Reusable Cleanroom Mop**.  URL: (Hydroflex Group) [www.hydroflex-group.com/en/product/purmop-z40/](https://www.hydroflex-group.com/en/product/purmop-z40/) – Description: The PurMop Z40 is a heavy-duty reusable polyester/microfiber cleanroom mop head for ISO 3–8/GMP areas. Its short-loop polyester-knit fabric delivers even fluid distribution with low particle release. Designed for floors, walls and ceilings in critical environments (pharma, medtech), Z40 maxes out cleaning performance while being machine-washable and autoclavable. Comes in packs of 10 (50 per carton) and is compatible with Hydroflex mop frames/handles or universal systems. – **Confidence:** Medium-high. **Score:** 0.85. *Reason:* Official product spec from manufacturer; meets cleanroom criteria. *Concerns:* This is mop head only (no bucket included); needs compatible autoclavable handle/wringer. Availability may be more limited than global brands, but fits exact ISO/GMP requirements.

- **Thermo Fisher Scientific – Pierce™ Chromogenic Endotoxin Quant Kit (60 reactions).** URL: https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/A39552.  This is an endpoint chromogenic LAL assay kit (lyophilized Limulus lysate with chromogenic substrate) for endotoxin quantitation.  Includes lyophilized LAL reagent, *E.* coli endotoxin standard, chromogenic substrate, and endotoxin-free water (store 2–8 °C).  Sensitivity range ~0.01–1 EU/mL (with standard curve). Intended use is compendial endotoxin testing (USP/EP) in pharma QC.  *Confidence:* High. *Rec. score:* 0.90 – Tier-1 manufacturer (Thermo FS) with well-established reagents. *Reason:* Proven brand and validated product, fully backed by technical support. *Concerns:* Endpoint chromogenic format (not gel-clot), smaller kit size (60 tests), and labeled for laboratory use (not explicitly IVD/GMP-certified).
  
- **MilliporeSigma (Sigma-Aldrich) – E-TOXATE™ Endotoxin Detection Kit (50 tests).** URL: https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/US/en/product/sigma/et0100.  This is a classic gel-clot LAL reagent kit (Limulus polyphemus amebocyte lysate) sufficient for 50 assays.  Kit contains LAL lysate vials (0.03–0.25 EU/mL sensitivity options available), control standard endotoxin, and water.  Store at 2–8 °C.  It detects bacterial endotoxins by clot formation. *Confidence:* High. *Rec. score:* 0.85 – Established life-science supplier (Merck) with long history in endotoxin testing. *Reason:* FDA-licensed LAL reagent, widely used in pharma QC. *Concerns:* Labeled Quality Level 200 (analytical lab grade, research use); not specifically sold as USP/EP-compendial kit; available in limited pack sizes (20–50 tests).
  
- **Associates of Cape Cod (ACCI) – Pyrotell® Gel-Clot LAL Assay.** URL: https://www.acciusa.com/products-and-services/bet-products/lal-reagents/pyrotell. versions.enriched_query: Request for detailed vendor information and comparison for a Sodium Dodecyl Sulfate - Molecular Weight Analysis Kit, product code PN390953. This kit is intended for protein molecular weight analysis by SDS polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis (SDS-PAGE) and related methods in biopharmaceutical research and quality control. Please provide information on pricing, storage specifications, shelf life, regulatory certifications, package size, exact catalog or part number, manufacturer or supplier name, and typical delivery timelines. Additionally, include data on molecular weight range, detection sensitivity, compatible detection systems or instruments, and included reagents or components. Product must be suitable for laboratory use and compatible with standard protein electrophoresis workflows. Information on lot consistency and validation data is also highly valued for scientific and QC applications.

comparison_attributes.description: Cost of the kit per unit, including currency and quantity breakdown.
Recommended temperature and storage requirements for product stability.
Period during which the product remains stable and usable if properly stored.
Regulatory and quality certifications for the product.
Number of units, reactions, or tests per package/kit.
Manufacturer-provided SKU, catalog, or reference number.
Company or brand that manufactures or supplies the product.
Expected delivery timeframe and current stock or backorder status.
Range of molecular weights the kit can accurately analyze or resolve.
Minimum detectable quantity or limit of detection for protein bands.
Detailed list or types of reagents or standards included in the kit.
Compatible electrophoresis and detection platforms (e.g., gel systems, readers).

discovery.raw_response:
- **SciEX (AB Sciex)** – **Product:** SDS-MW Analysis Kit (for PA 800 Plus) – **URL:** [SDS-MW Analysis Kit](https://us-store.sciex.com/USD/capillary-electrophoresis/chemistries-and-kits/kits/SDS-MW-Analysis-Kit-zid390953) (verified working) – **Description:** A complete kit for protein size determination by SDS-PAGE capillary electrophoresis, including separation capillaries, SDS separation buffer, SDS sample buffer, molecular weight standards (10–225 kDa), internal 10 kDa standard, and wash solutions. (Part #390953; 100-sample kit.) – **Confidence:** High (exact product/part number match) – **Verified:** Yes (sciex.com loads product page) – **Recommendation Score:** 0.9 – **Reason:** Broadly trusted Danaher/SCIEX instrument supplier; exact kit for SDS molecular-weight analysis. – **Concerns:** Specific to Beckman PA 800 Plus system; may not be needed for standard slab gels; price level ($1,525 US list) is high.  

- **Thermo Fisher Scientific (Invitrogen)** – **Product:** PageRuler™ Prestained Protein Ladder, 10–180 kDa – **URL:** [PageRuler Prestained Protein Ladder](https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/hk/en/26616) – **Description:** A premixed, prestained protein ladder of ten colored bands (10–180 kDa) in loading buffer, optimized for SDS-PAGE; supplied as 2 × 250 µL (50 tests per vial). (Recommended for all standard SDS-PAGE gels.) – **Confidence:** High – **Verified:** Yes (thermofisher.com loads product page) – **Recommendation Score:** 0.9 – **Reason:** Tier-1 global reagent supplier; well-established, high-quality SDS-PAGE ladder with lot consistency; Thermo’s ladders are widely used. – **Concerns:** Fixed size range (10–180 kDa), may not cover >180 kDa; requires purchase of loading dye (already in buffer) and Coomassie stain separately.  

- **MilliporeSigma (Merck)** – **Product:** Perfect Protein™ Markers, 10–225 kDa – **URL:** [Perfect Protein Markers, 10–225 kDa](https://www.merckmillipore.com/IL/en/product/mm/69079) – **Description:** A liquid protein ladder mix of 11 recombinant proteins (10–225 kDa) for SDS-PAGE molecular-weight calibration. Supplied 500 µL (sufficient for ~100 lanes), optimized for Coomassie staining; includes SDS sample buffer for denaturation (Cat. no. 70607). – **Confidence:** High – **Verified:** Yes – **Recommendation Score:** 0.9 – **Reason:** Established life-sciences reagents division of Merck; “Perfect Protein” markers are FDA-registered/ISO-compliant; lot-to-lot optimized for linear migration; broad range. – **Concerns:** Product is a marker-only kit (no gel), intended for Coomassie detection, additional reagents (running buffer, stain) needed; price may vary by distributor.  

- **Bio-Rad Laboratories** – **Product:** Precision Plus Protein™ All Blue Prestained Standards – **URL:** [Precision Plus All Blue Prestained Standards, #1610393](https://www.bio-rad.com/en-se/sku/1610393-precision-plus-protein-all-blue-prestained-protein-standards-value-pack?ID=1610393) – **Description:** A value-pack kit of five vials (5 × 500 µL) containing a mixture of ten highly purified prestained proteins (10–250 kDa, blue-blast stained) with three internal reference bands (25, 50, 75 kDa); pre-diluted and ready to load, ~250 uses. – **Confidence:** High – **Verified:** Yes – **Recommendation Score:** 0.9 – **Reason:** Bio-Rad is a top-tier electrophoresis reagent manufacturer; Precision Plus ladders are industry-standard for SDS-PAGE and reliable for QC; comes with documentation. – **Concerns:** Prestained only (less sensitive than unstained); may require fluorescence or visible scanner; kit does not include buffers or gel matrix.  

- **Cytiva (GE Healthcare Life Sciences)** – **Product:** Protein and Peptide Molecular Weight Markers – **URL:** [HMW-SDS Marker Kit: Gel (Cytiva Brand)](https://www.fishersci.ie/shop/products/ge-healthcare-protein-peptide-molecular-weight-markers-1/10136284) – **Description:** High-MW SDS-PAGE protein marker kit (e.g. 10–225+ kDa range) branded “Cytiva Life Sciences”; provides sharp Coomassie/silver-stainable bands for precise molecular weight estimation in standard SDS-PAGE. – **Confidence:** Medium (product info from Fisher, not direct site) – **Verified:** Yes (Fisher-scientific Ireland site shows kit) – **Recommendation Score:** 0.7 – **Reason:** Cytiva (formerly GE) is an established global biopharma supplier with ISO/FDA-regulated products; these markers are formulated for high accuracy. – **Concerns:** The specific “17-0615-01” HMW-SDS kit appears discontinued/out of stock (Fisher sci). Alternative Cytiva markers may need to be sourced; may require buffer/stain purchase separately.
